div.p: INDEXED is a sub-element available within BIOGRAPHY PERSONNAME . It captures names that are standard to either the British Library catalogue or the Library of Congress catalogue, but that Orlando has chosen not to use as the STANDARD form. It exists to ensure that a researcher does not search in library catalogues for this author under her STANDARD name in Orlando. This tag has attributes INDEXSOURCE, REG and WROTEORPUBLISHEDAS.

div.codeblock: <INDEXED INDEXSOURCE="BL">Anna Letitia Waring</> <INDEXED INDEXSOURCE=BL WROTEORPUBLISHEDAS=WROTEPUBLISHEDASYES > Sophie F. F. Veitch </INDEXED> </DATAITEM>

div.p: See PERSONNAME for general name practices.
